Quick Bio

I am a Ph.D. Candidate in Computer Science at University of Wisconsin-Madison. My research is focused on developing systems for large scale data analysis.

Previously, I completed my undergraduate degree at Grand Valley State University, studying Computer Science with minors in mathematics and writing.

Research Interests

  • Systems
  • HPC
  • Machine Learning
